name: Zombie Rush！
description:
In this extremely tense and stimulating game, your only purpose is to survive.
You need to escape the clutches of zombies, and use the steering angle to guide them to harm each other. The longer you persist, the higher your score.

Game Rules:
Two-Handed Mode. To turn left, tap on the left screen; To turn right, tap on the right screen.

One-Handed Mode. Tap anywhere on the screen, a virtual joystick will appear, which can be dragged to steer the character's direction.

Game Features:
1 Two modes of operation to choose from
2 Tense and stimulating game rhythm
3 Original and dynamic electronic music
4 Can quickly share game screenshots to friends
